column4: for some reason my mic won't work on Linux, do i have to do anything special to get it to work
for some reason my mic won't work on Linux, do i have to do anything special to get it to work
Check the microphone/line-in mixer levels first
Some sound chipsets can also selectively mute input sources; make sure you've unmuted them in the GNOME mixer applet
I've heard gnomemeeting is ok; tried that yet?
